reviews.review_msg: This was a fun class. The readings are quite light for a third year Phil class (about 20 pages per week) and the weekly responses were easy to write. The papers were fairly marked as well. I would definitely take another class with prof Lauro.

Dr. Laurio is a nice prof, who genuinely cares about his students. There is quite a lot of reading for this class, 1 reading per week, 12 in total. At the beginning of a lecture, you will do a response about the assigned reading, the 4 lowest ones will be dropped. If you need help with your essay, recommend booking an appointment with him.
